body: Lattafa Yara for Women Eau de Parfum Spray is an exquisite fragrance that evokes a sense of elegance and sophistication. The scent is captivating, with a perfect blend of floral and musky notes that leave a lasting impression. Upon first application, you are greeted with a burst of fresh and vibrant floral accords, reminiscent of a blooming garden in spring. The top notes of bergamot, blackcurrant, and peach add a touch of fruity sweetness, enhancing the overall allure of the fragrance. As the perfume settles, the heart notes of jasmine, rose, and violet begin to emerge, enveloping you in a delicate and feminine aroma. These floral notes are beautifully balanced, creating a harmonious blend that is both alluring and comforting. The base notes of musk, amber, and vanilla provide a warm and sensual foundation to the fragrance. They add depth and longevity to the scent, ensuring that it lingers on your skin throughout the day. Lattafa Yara for Women Eau de Parfum Spray is a versatile fragrance that can be worn for any occasion. Whether it's a casual day out or a special evening event, this perfume will enhance your confidence and leave a lasting impression. I highly recommend Lattafa Yara for Women Eau de Parfum Spray to anyone who appreciates the beauty of floral fragrances with a touch of sensuality. It is a captivating scent that is sure to turn heads and leave a lasting impression. Don't miss out on the opportunity to experience this exquisite fragrance.
date: Reviewed in the United States on June 29, 2024
title: Don‚Äôt miss out on this opportunity to experience this exquisite fragrance!!

I've never bought a Middle eastern product before, but I'm glad I did because I absolutely love this scent üíØ. It has such an amazing aroma: a sweet floral and vanilla scent that feels light and feminine. The scent lingers on your clothes and doesn't vanish quickly. It's long-lasting and smells luxurious. body: The media could not be loaded. I am absolutely in love with Versace Bright Crystal! From the moment I opened the beautifully designed box, I knew I was in for a treat. The bottle itself is a piece of art ‚Äì elegant and sophisticated, perfectly capturing the essence of the fragrance within. The scent is a delightful blend that feels both fresh and clean, yet luxuriously classy. It's perfect for any occasion, whether you're heading to a formal event or just want to feel special on a regular day. It is sweet and floral with the perfect balance that is both light and captivating without being overpowering. I prefer to have a light and airy scent and this hits every point. What I appreciate most about Versace Bright Crystal is its versatility. It transitions seamlessly from day to night, making it a staple in my collection. Every time I wear it, I receive compliments and inquiries about what perfume I'm wearing. It truly makes me feel confident and elegant. If you're looking for a fragrance that combines beauty, class, and a fresh, clean scent, look no further than Versace Bright Crystal. It has become my go-to perfume, and I cannot recommend it enough. This is a must-have for anyone who loves to feel luxurious and sophisticated every day!
date: Reviewed in the United States on June 16, 2024
title: A Luxurious and Timeless Fragrance!

body: Happy to report this is a legitimate bottle of Versace Bright Crystal! I was a little worried after reading a bunch of the reviews saying people were receiving fakes, so thankfully that wasn‚Äôt the case! As for the scent: it is a very uplifting, clean, fresh, fruity-floral. Not powdery floral at all. It is a perfect scent for everyday, spring/summer, and can even work as a night out fragrance. The longevity is right in the middle on my skin (about 3-5 hours depending on how much I put on), but it lingers longer on my clothes. I think this a is fantastic value for the size and makes the short-ish longevity worth it!

body: The perfume is fairly strong and lasts at least through an entire work day. The scent is not working for me. When opening the bottle I was hit with a heavy, powdery and floral smell. Upon application to my arms there was a minty smell added to the powdered floral scent. All three scents competed with each other for the next several hours giving me a headache while creating a cloud of smell around me. After about 6 hours it died down enough to not be overpowering and allowed the sandlewood, amber, and a hint of vanilla to shine while also calming the powdery musk scent. As for its effects, IDK. I have used the original and it worked incredibly well, so theoretically this one should work too. I just haven't used it around others because of how strong it is.

body: When I first received this scent last summer, I really liked it. It was a sweet, pleasant musk scent that was really nice and great for the price. I rotate through scents and lost track of the bottle for a bit so there were a few months that I couldn't find it. When I found and went to use it again, I was surprised to find the scent had changed and it was now this awful armpit kind of smell. I thought maybe there was just something up with me, that maybe allergies or a recent sickness was affecting my sense of smell. But after several months of trying to like this scent, i'm throwing in the towel. I don't know if the fact that it's a roll on and you're technically getting your skin cells and body oils on the roller ball might have reacted with the perfume to change the chemistry of it, but whatever happened I am sad to consider it completely unusable now. It may be cheap, but a perfume that is largely going to go to waste after a couple months is not worth any price in my book.

I have had multiple partners over the last 6 months comment on how good I smell (one even told me that my skin just smelled so amazing and he thought it was just the way I smelled). body: I don‚Äôt usually write reviews, but had to share my experience today. I figured I would try this to see what all the hype was about. I wasn‚Äôt exactly hopeful, but it‚Äôs viral for a reason, right? I just purchased this last night. I put it on before an event this morning and ‚Äúregulars‚Äù who are married men and don‚Äôt usually speak more than a few words to me were holding conversations with me. Nothing inappropriate or flirty by any means, but I know I typically come across as unapproachable and I was certainly approached more than usual. I‚Äôve known these people several years now and this is the first time we‚Äôve had conversations! Coincidence? Possibly. Fast forward to this afternoon. My s/o and I had an argument last night. Typically, he‚Äôs too annoyed to bother with me if we are upset with each other but he was FOLLOWING me from room to room unable to keep his hands off me. I had to push him off and ask what his deal was. Then I stopped, started laughing, and put two and two together. I mean it HAS TO be this perfume. It HAS TO! This man has NEVER been an octopus like this! Ever. Asking me to kiss him over and over!?! I don‚Äôt know. Get it. Just get it. I‚Äôm not that outgoing or friendly so today‚Äôs attention has nothing to do with my sparkling personality.

title: Very Manly smelling

body: ~ The perfume oil smell exquisite, it gives off a sweet musky smell. It's super addicting even I cant stop smelling my own wrist. My husband sitting on the bed notice the smell right away & told me  What's that smell, I told him, its my new perfume I order, he complimented saying it smell super nice. Of course I smile all proud because I was in complete shock, he notice it so quickly without me telling him first. I wanted to put it to the test since everyone on tiktok was raving all about this perfume oil. So, I wear it to the Fresno Hmong New Year. - Overall experience, noone came up to me! Which was a bummer because I'm starting to doubt this perfume. I had my makeup, hair and complete traditional outfit on too. Only thing that happen was a few men's ( from mid 28-OG) was concern for me & and ask if I was okay. For all my ladies out there wearing heels will understand, I was at the Hmong new years for 5hrs & couldn't walk in heels anymore so of course I took them off and walk barefoot around the festival. :) True definition of  BEAUTY IS PAIN. MY THOUGHTS ON THIS PRODUCT : ~ It doesn't make men go too crazy like on social media. ~ Must apply every time once the smell starts to abate. I apply every 2hrs. ~ It does make you feel super confident & in your feminine energy after you apply it. The smell is similar to those Victoria Secret perfume but only difference is Pure Instinct has PHEROMONES, which attracts people while Victoria Secret perfume doesn't have. *** For all my ladies : Men are attracted to sweet & delicate scent so if your debating on buying this product. I say purchase it right away & put it to your knowledge. Everyone has there own certain unique smell so the experience will be different from mine. Not only is this oil delightful in smell, it gives off an sexual arousement. Even I was quite turn on while applying this on. ***

body: In the realm of pheromone colognes, I stumbled upon a small bottle that performed like a charm ‚Äì alas, it's now a relic of the past. (It is now discontinued but was from an Amazon company called Healthy Vibes) Hence, I embarked on a quest for a worthy successor and settled for this roll-on variant. While it does the job adequately, it lacks the sheer magic of its predecessor. The scent is pleasant, yet I lack concrete evidence of its pheromonal prowess, unlike the previous elixir that yielded tangible results. With the former, a mere spritz invoked attention I hadn't known possible. There was this one memorable encounter ‚Äì post our horizontal escapade, she caught a whiff of my neck, likening it to the aroma of freshly baked bread. Instantly, her arousal surged, reigniting our passion without delay. Such is the power of a well-crafted scent! Funny stories assign this pure instinct pheromone cologne is a very nice addition to my nightlife escapades, though it hasn't shown the same effect as the ladder, It's still a nice smell and I like to wear it from time to time.

title: get it

body: I applied this 3 times; twice when I was about to go to bed, then once in the morning. I did notice that hubby at first rolled closer to my side of the bed, but I think because we were so tired, nothing transpired. I know pheromones work with the chemicals in your existing pH and hormones, and because I am currently menstruating, maybe that has something to do with it not working on him at this time? (I‚Äôm a nurse, but I‚Äôm not sure how this works tbh). Early this morning, I reapplied, and he didn‚Äôt notice. Zip. Nada. He held my hand and was playful, but nothing out of the ordinary. Lol, maybe his olfactory nerves are shot. Hahahaha. I gave it 4 stars because of the scent itself. It has a wonderfully pleasant and warm sweet vanilla aroma, with a hint of citrus. Nothing too overpowering. Over time, the scent fades and sort of adjusts to your own. It‚Äôs really nice. About to hit the gym with my husband, with the pheromone perfume still on‚Ä¶so TBD.  We‚Äôll see if I get compliments. Edited to add:  I‚Äôm off my period and used it again. Hubby has been a tiny bit more affectionate with me. When I hit the gym, someone shyly came up to me and asked when I would be done with my set. Then it just seemed like a decent amount of guys flocked near me (about 3-4, and I think a couple of them were gym buddies). None of them spoke to me (I‚Äôm sure seeing my wedding band may have turned them off), but they stuck around until I was done lifting dumbbells. They scattered soon after I left. On the train, a guy kept staring at me. Very creepy, as he would smoke his cigarette then stare. I just kept scrolling on my phone until my stop came, and was glad we had different stops. When I got home, hubby was his same usual self, but in bed, he kept trying to touch me even if I wasn‚Äôt exactly in the mood! Hahahaha. Maybe I just needed to be off my period for it to work.

title: Smells amazing

body: The scent reminds me of a really expensive perfume that a friend of mine had given me a few years ago. I don‚Äôt smell anything remotely close to rose or citrus. It‚Äôs a very warm, musky scent. It‚Äôs just ‚Äúokay‚Äù as far as scent goes. Now, for the really interesting part. I never told my husband I purchased this. I put it on immediately after opening. Applying it to my wrists, behind my ears, between my breasts, behind my knees and in the creases where my arms bend. It sounds like a lot, but very minimal amounts were applied. I let it sit and absorb into my skin and it was was a very warm, fall/winter scent on me. I know it depends on your pH levels etc for the way it smells on each person and when. But the minute my husband was around me, he could NOT keep his hands off me!!! He kept saying how good I smelled, kissing me and well‚Ä¶you can guess what happened later on lol. He is typically NOT like this at all so it took me by surprise! I decided to wear it out while running errands and had several men opening doors for me, standing close to me and even telling me how good I smelled! So, as far as effectiveness goes, I give it a 10/10 for sure! Scent-wise, I think it depends on your body, but it definitely smelled really nice once it absorbed into my skin.

title: It‚Äôs‚Ä¶Interesting

body: I didn't buy this to attempt to attract men lol 1st of all I'm happily married so no need but I thought that since it Saif it will smell diff on everybody that it would kinda give me my own signature scent plus smell good obviously. Well, it's inexpensive so that's good, it smells delicious so that's good...what's the bad??? After it's been on a cpl hours, it goes from a smell u want to cover urself in to a grandma perfume musk that u want to run from so my tip is this...only use small amount! The less the better bcuz its very strong so ur gna smell great with little product behind the ears n a dot under each wrist that way after a few hrs n that smell fades to a musky one, u can't really smell that. Whatever u do tho, if u are out somewhere n notice hours later that u can smell the musk on ur wrist or wherever...do not reapply thinking u will get the great scent again cuz u WILL...but when THAT fades, oh boy u better head for the retirement home lmao!

body: I recently tried Pure Instinct CRAVE Roll-On, The Original Pheromone Infused Essential Oil, and I'm absolutely delighted with the results! This roll-on has quickly become my go-to scent for both everyday wear and special occasions. The fragrance is simply intoxicating ‚Äì a blend of light florals and citrus notes with a hint of musk that is both alluring and captivating. I love how it subtly enhances my natural scent, creating an aura of confidence and sensuality wherever I go. Plus, the convenient roll-on applicator makes it easy to apply just the right amount of fragrance, whether I'm dabbing it on my pulse points or layering it with other perfumes. The pheromone-infused formula adds an extra layer of allure, attracting attention and sparking connections with those around me. Since incorporating Pure Instinct CRAVE into my beauty routine, I've received countless compliments on its irresistible scent and noticed a positive response from those around me. Whether you're looking to enhance your natural allure or simply indulge in a luxurious fragrance experience, I highly recommend giving Pure Instinct CRAVE Roll-On a try ‚Äì it's a must-have addition to any perfume collection!

body: I recently purchased the Pure Instinct CRAVE Roll-On Pheromone Infused Essential Oil Perfume Cologne for Her, and I have been loving it! This beautifully scented perfume is infused with pheromones, adding an extra layer of allure and intrigue to my daily routine. The roll-on application makes it easy to apply the fragrance precisely where I want it, allowing me to control the intensity of the scent. The 0.34 fl oz size is perfect for on-the-go use and is TSA ready, making it convenient for travel. The scent of Pure Instinct CRAVE is captivating and sensual, with delicate floral notes and hints of citrus. I find that it's perfect for everyday wear, adding a touch of sophistication and mystery to any outfit. I appreciate that this perfume is made with essential oils, which provides a natural and long-lasting fragrance that blends beautifully with my body chemistry. The addition of pheromones adds an extra element of attraction, making me feel confident and empowered whenever I wear it. Overall, I highly recommend the Pure Instinct CRAVE Roll-On Pheromone Infused Essential Oil Perfume Cologne for Her to anyone looking for a unique and captivating fragrance. It's a great addition to any perfume collection and is sure to turn heads wherever you go.

title: SPICY RESULTS

body: I first bought this perfume last year, smelled it and really liked it! Shortly after, I took it out with me in my bag on a night out. My bag was stolen that night with all of my contents... I wonder if my great scent is what lured the burglar to me... I repurchased this perfume in the following months after the scowl finally wore off of my face from my prior experience. Still smells great! Woo! The roller is a bit abrasive on the skin of my neck but... It's fine... Oops ... No it isn't apparently. I put it on my neck Friday night, and maybe it's because I used several passes of the scent on my flesh, but I broke into a horrible bumpy rash on my entire neck up into my ears and hairline, 360‚Å∞. It burns, it itches, I am reading ancient stories of our creation from the braille novels on my skin... It's been almost a week and the rash has not subsided. Very sad and disappointed as I will now never use this product on my neck again which was really the only place that mattered for me. Rip.
date: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
title: Pro: smells good Con: bad rash

body: Listen, when I want a boost in attention for men for whatever reason... this is my go to! I'm a perfume fanatic. As far as the scent is concerned, I don't hate it. However, I'm not the biggest fan of it. I wouldn't say that it stinks, it is just not a scent profile that I would not gravitate towards. It is light enough to wear with other perfumes. I typically place this rollerball perfume behind my ear. This is just to not disturb my other fragrance that I have on. Perfume is subjective anyways so don't go off of my scent review. I will say that the dry down is different than what it smells like in the bottle. Leans a little sweeter than the musk smell that it opens with. Now to the most important part. Men go out of their way to do something for me. I can't sing to save my life. This man told me I had a beautiful singing voice. I side eyed him so hard, but I remembered that I had this on. Men will let the door close behind them as they walk away, see me walking to it, and come back to open it. I do not get this on a regular day. I wore this for a couple romantic interest and when I say they could not keep there hands off me I absolutely mean that. I got turnt everyway but loose (in a good way). One was a cuddle type of person and I swear he kept me in a headlock all night long. The other does not like to cuddle as much, but just couldn't help but to snuggle up. I'm not one for coincidences, so I will put my trust in this product. It definitely does its job. Just give it a try and see where the night might land you ;)
date: Reviewed in the United States on July 31, 2023

body: I had high hopes for this product and I'm disappointed. Pheromone perfumes/oils change based on your chemistry, or something like that. body: So this purfume is definitely very unique and very interesting. When I first unpackaged it and smelled the bottle, it was definitely a strong, musky smell that almost smelled like pine.. but after I put it on and rubbed it in (and sat with it for a few minutes) it definitely became more of a sweeter, lighter smell. This is definitely and intimate purfume that does smell nice if youre the type to like those kinds of things, but do I think it will attract your boyfriend, girlfriend, or spouse? No. I think that all the hype around this purfume is just the sellers convincing us that it will make us more attractive. With that being said, I think that when we apply this purfume it gives us a confidence boost which (might) make us more attractive in some way. This product was well packaged and is a fairly decent size, and it is a full bottle when you first get it.

body: Not a huge fan of many scents and haven't used body spray since I was in middle school and I searched and read the reviews of very few scents I might like, and would complement my main scent, Armani Code for her. It's sweet and feminine. I haven't yet paired the two but on its own, very lovely. It doesn't last long. I sprayed it about 3 times and it mostly got on my hair and some on my clothes. As I'm going to bed now, I can still smell it in my hair, which is clean. I like that about it. A subtle dark scent that isn't a cloud around me. I've read somewhere long ago that people should smell you when you leave a room; not before you enter it. Edit: I poured the body spray into a small spray bottle with about 15 drops of carrier oil(I used rosehip oil) and I find the scent lasts longer. Gotta shake it every use, and turn the nozzle so it's misting and not squirting. Still love thisüñ§üñ§üñ§

title: It smells amazing

body: Nautica Voyage Eau De Toilette for Men has quickly become one of my favorite fragrances. Here‚Äôs why I‚Äôm so impressed with this scent: 1. Invigorating Fragrance: The scent of Nautica Voyage is absolutely invigorating. It opens with fresh, green, and apple notes, giving it a crisp and clean feel. The middle notes of mimosa blended with water lotus create a light and refreshing vibe, while the base notes of cedarwood, musk, and amber add a warm and masculine finish. 2. Long-Lasting: One of the standout features of this cologne is its longevity. Just a couple of sprays in the morning keep me smelling fresh throughout the entire day. It‚Äôs rare to find an eau de toilette with such staying power, and Nautica Voyage delivers impressively in this regard. 3. Versatile: This fragrance is incredibly versatile. It‚Äôs perfect for any occasion, whether you‚Äôre heading to the office, going out for a casual day with friends, or having a romantic evening out. The scent is light enough for daytime wear yet sophisticated enough for evening occasions. 4. Excellent Value: Nautica Voyage offers excellent value for the quality. It‚Äôs priced affordably compared to many other high-end fragrances, making it an accessible option for anyone looking to elevate their scent game without breaking the bank. 5. Attractive Packaging: The packaging is sleek and stylish. The bottle has a nautical design that reflects the fresh, marine-inspired scent inside. It looks great on my dresser and adds a touch of elegance to my grooming collection. 6. Compliment Magnet: I‚Äôve received numerous compliments since I started wearing Nautica Voyage. It‚Äôs always nice when people notice and appreciate your fragrance, and this cologne consistently gets positive remarks from both men and women. 7. Non-Overpowering: The scent is perfectly balanced and not overpowering. It has a subtle yet noticeable presence that makes it ideal for those who prefer a fragrance that‚Äôs not too strong but still makes a statement. Overall, Nautica Voyage Eau De Toilette for Men is a fantastic choice for anyone seeking a fresh, versatile, and long-lasting fragrance. It combines quality, affordability, and a scent that‚Äôs sure to leave a lasting impression. I highly recommend giving it a try.
date: Reviewed in the United States on July 31, 2024
title: A Refreshing and Timeless Scent

body: Nautica Voyage Eau De Toilette for Men has quickly become my go-to fragrance for everyday wear. Here‚Äôs why this scent deserves a full five-star rating: Fresh and Invigorating Scent: The first thing that strikes you about Nautica Voyage is its incredibly fresh and invigorating scent. The fruity top notes of apple are perfectly balanced with the aquatic notes of water lotus, creating a crisp and clean aroma that is both refreshing and uplifting. It's an ideal fragrance for daytime wear, giving you a boost of confidence and energy. Subtle Yet Romantic: What sets this fragrance apart is its subtle romantic undertone. The heart notes of water lotus and cedarwood add a gentle woody aroma that gives the scent a warm and inviting feel. This combination makes it not only suitable for casual wear but also for more intimate, romantic occasions. Long-Lasting and Effective: Despite being an Eau De Toilette, Nautica Voyage has impressive longevity. A few sprays in the morning last well into the afternoon, making it a reliable choice for busy days. The scent evolves beautifully over time, starting with the fresh fruity notes and gradually settling into the deeper woody and musky base notes of cedarwood and musk. Versatile and Adaptable: This fragrance‚Äôs versatility is one of its strongest points. It‚Äôs light enough for office wear, yet sophisticated enough for a dinner date. Whether you're heading to a meeting, a casual outing, or a romantic evening, Nautica Voyage adapts to the occasion seamlessly. Attractive Packaging: The 3.3 Fl Oz bottle is elegantly designed and looks great on any dresser. The sleek, minimalist design reflects the clean and fresh nature of the scent inside. It‚Äôs also a generous size, providing excellent value for money. Conclusion: Nautica Voyage Eau De Toilette for Men is a masterfully crafted fragrance that perfectly balances fresh, fruity notes with warm, woody undertones. Its versatility, longevity, and appealing scent make it a standout choice for any man. Whether for daily wear or special occasions, this fragrance is a winner. Highly recommended for anyone looking to add a touch of freshness and romance to their daily routine.
date: Reviewed in the United States on June 17, 2024
title: Perfectly Balanced and Refreshing Scent for Everyday Wear

body: I came across Nautica Voyage EDT while searching for a budget-friendly option. It stands out as a pleasant cologne in its own right. While I‚Äôm not particularly fond of fruity fragrances, Nautica Voyage‚Äôs fruity notes are well-balanced and become subtler after the dry down. I do wish it had a touch more citrus to complement its marine elements better. Citrus scents tend to enhance freshness, which could elevate the overall profile. However, given its price, Nautica Voyage is incredibly economical. It‚Äôs the most affordable cologne per ounce in my collection, making it a practical choice. I‚Äôd give it 4 stars primarily for its value and performance. It‚Äôs perfect for quick errands during warmer months and holds up well throughout the day. My wife appreciates its fresh appeal, although I reserve it for occasions where its fruitiness is less pronounced. Overall, Nautica Voyage EDT is a solid option for those seeking a fresh and budget-friendly fragrance.
date: Reviewed in the United States on June 29, 2024

title: Smells amazing

body: Ahoy, fragrance enthusiasts! Nautica Voyage has sailed into my life, and let me tell you, it's been quite the journey. I feel like a dapper sailor every time I spritz it on‚Äîfresh, clean, and ready to conquer the high seas (or at least the grocery store). First whiff? A delightful breeze of apple and green leaves, like a picnic in a coastal orchard. It‚Äôs invigorating and makes me feel like I'm starring in my own yacht commercial. The scent is light, refreshing, and perfect for those who want to smell like they‚Äôve just stepped off a luxury sailboat. But here‚Äôs the thing‚ÄîNautica Voyage isn‚Äôt for everyone. My buddy Dave tried it and said he felt like he was drowning in a sea of cucumbers. My other friend, Jenny, claimed it smelled like someone dumped a fruit salad in her gym bag. To each their own, I suppose! And let‚Äôs talk longevity. It lasts longer than I expected, which is great for me but might not be so great if you‚Äôre stuck in an elevator with someone who isn‚Äôt a fan of oceanic adventures. One coworker commented that I smelled like a wet forest, which I choose to take as a compliment, though I‚Äôm not entirely sure it was. So, if you're ready for a voyage of your own and don‚Äôt mind a few waves of cucumber and apple, Nautica Voyage might just be your new first mate. But fair warning: it‚Äôs smooth sailing for some and choppy waters for others! Anchors away! üö¢
date: Reviewed in the United States on July 21, 2024
title: Nautica Voyage: Smooth Sailing for Some, Choppy Waters for Others!

body: This smells really clean, fresh out of the shower type of vibe. I think it's perfect for daily casual wear. I'm sure there are stronger and maybe better similar scents out there if you want the best of the best, but they'll all be over $100 when this is only $20 and does the job.

The appearance of the bottle is exactly as described, stylish and crystal clear. The size and quality is amazing. It doesnt leave a buring effect on the skin. Super easy to carry around and use. body: Good crisp fragrance that lasts. Caught this on sale and decided to give it a try. Reminds me of other scents from the 90s through the early 2000s, but that is not a bad thing. Good scent for spring summer and fall. You can probably get away with wearing this in the winter but warmer fragrances are my go to for fall and winter. Smells a little different on my skin that in the air. Again, not a problem just my observation. You might smell it different or even react differently to it. body: Who doesn't love a Yankee Candle? The Pink Sands Scented Candle is one of my favorites. It smells delicious, reminiscent of warm suntan oil on a summer day. Pros: Bold Scent: The fragrance is strong and fills the room beautifully. I love how bold Yankee Candle scents are. Long-Lasting: These candles last a long time, giving you plenty of enjoyment before needing a replacement. Versatile Usage: Lately, I've been using them with candle warmers, and it creates a nice, consistent scent throughout my home. Overall, the Yankee Candle Pink Sands Scented Candle is a wonderful addition to any home, providing a delightful and lasting fragrance. Highly recommend!
date: Reviewed in the United States on June 12, 2024
title: Delicious Scent and Long-Lasting Fragrance

body: Yankee Candle Pink Sands Scented Classic 22oz Large Glass Jar Candle is a delightful choice. With an impressive burn time of over 110 hours, it ensures lasting enjoyment. These candles are not only fragrant but also beautifully packaged in a decorative glass jar with a lid, making them an excellent gift for any occasion. However, I encountered a minor issue: the candle didn‚Äôt burn all the way to the bottom. A few ounces remained unreachable, frustratingly out of reach for a regular lighter. My recommendation? Invest in a Utility Lighter. When the candle burns down closer to the bottom, this handy tool allows you to reach the wick without struggling. After all, there‚Äôs nothing worse than a partially used candle that can‚Äôt be relit!  I also wish it were a bit stronger since the aroma is milder then I expected.üïØÔ∏èüí°

body: No shame to Yankee Company. I love their products and buy plenty. This is for anyone in the summer, do not buy candles. They will come melted beyond repair.  I'm mad I didn't think about this possibly happening. So it must have been sitting on a truck for a bit. When I opened the amazing well done packaging the wax was already hard to the touch so that tells me the delivery driver today was not to blame. I opened the box about a minute after it was delivered. I'm disabled and can't drive so I can't return it. And don't own a computer to print a label off. I'll just leave this as a lesson learned to not buy candles in the summer. Can't even see the wick. All wax melted to one side. Can't figure out how to upload my pictures.  Just buy your candles at a store. Still love Yankee candles!!!

body: I've been purchasing Yankee Candles for years now.  Why?  Their scents are strong and don't smell waxy.  The candle itself lasts a very long time.  You can purchase the cheap 3 for $10 candles at Michaels but they don't have the strong lasting scent nor do they burn for long.  The wax in these doesn't puddle up around the wick, a common problem with some candles.  This causes the flame to be extinguished.  When the candle burns down too low to light anymore I use a candle/coffee warmer to continue to enjoy the scent for many more days.  I have a supply of these candles on hand at all times and will always buy them.

body: I recently purchased the Capri Blue Volcano Scented Candle, and it has quickly become my absolute favorite. From the moment I opened the stylish packaging, I knew I was in for a treat. The scent of this candle is absolutely divine. The Volcano fragrance is a perfect blend of tropical fruits, sugared oranges, lemons, and limes, creating a refreshing and uplifting aroma that fills the room without being overpowering. It's the kind of scent that instantly transports you to a tropical paradise, making it ideal for creating a cozy and inviting atmosphere. The burn time of this candle is impressive. Despite its compact size, it burns evenly and lasts for a long time. I appreciate the clean and steady flame, which adds to the overall ambiance. The quality of the wax is excellent, leaving no residue on the glass jar. Speaking of the jar, the design is simple yet elegant. The beautiful blue color complements any decor, and the subtle label adds a touch of sophistication. The lid is a nice touch, helping to preserve the fragrance when the candle is not in use. While the price point may be a bit higher than some other candles on the market, the quality and fragrance of the Capri Blue Volcano Scented Candle make it well worth the investment. It's a luxurious addition to my home, and I'll definitely be purchasing more in the future. If you're looking for a high-quality candle with an amazing fragrance, look no further than Capri Blue's Volcano candle ‚Äì you won't be disappointed!
date: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
title: You won't be disappointed

body: The obvious? It‚Äôs a candle. It smells good. These guys are asking for a review‚Ä¶and I couldn‚Äôt just give the thing five stars and move on. Nope‚Ä¶I‚Äôm REQUIRED to write an essay?! Of course they  want  more than a simple stars rating situation. Here it goes‚Ä¶ When I first received the candle‚Ä¶my heart almost beat out of my chest with pure elation. I held back the tears of joy as I tore open the Amazon box. As I ripped into the box‚Ä¶I stopped. I had to take a moment to emotionally prepare myself for the greatness of the NEW Volcano candle. I had wept for days after burning the last bit of my old Volcano candle. The old container had sat there on my desk‚Ä¶empty‚Ä¶cold‚Ä¶gently citrus scented and devoid of the sweet soft wax that glowed so gently from the jar. ‚ÄúWHY?!?!‚Äù I cried to the sky. ‚ÄúWhy did it have to burn out so soon?!‚Äù I had fallen to the floor‚Ä¶collapsing in sadness and regret, knowing that my last precious moments with the old candle were spent watching Tennessee beat Alabama on the SEC network. I‚Äôd never forget that precious moment. The light flickered slowly and burned out as the Tennessee Volunteers carried the goal posts down to the Tennessee River. I sat there in my office‚Ä¶watching ESPN‚Ä¶editing audio for Halloween drops on the radio station where I work‚Ä¶melancholy‚Ä¶mourning the loss of my friend‚Ä¶the Capri Blue Volcano Candle. In my sadness‚Ä¶I turned to Amazon and ordered a replacement. So‚Ä¶there I was‚Ä¶opening my replacement candle. I slowly removed the box remnants‚Ä¶delicately pulled out my candle lighter‚Ä¶and gently lit the wick. Tears filled my eyes as I pondered my life choices‚Ä¶my meaning in the great vastness of the universe and the ease of ordering a candle‚Ä¶without stepping one foot inside of a brick and mortar store. This is truly what dreams are made of. Thank you‚Ä¶thank you‚Ä¶thank you. It‚Äôs all I‚Äôve ever wanted. My only regret is that I could never repay the joy that this candle has given me. The end.
date: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2022
title: Volcano Capri Blue A Love Story

body: Well, I suppose there's a first time for everything.  I ordered this candle after some co-workers were raving about the scent but due to the price, I went with the small tin to make sure that I liked it before ordering a larger size.  When the candle was delivered, I opened it almost immediately so that I could burn it in my home office.  I was a little surprised by the inadequate packing as it was only in a little plastic bag and then, much to my surprise, my candle was already burned to almost nothing!  I'm assuming that someone used it and then returned it and there was little/no quality control in place to prevent it from being sent to someone else.  I immediately ordered a new one as a replacement and it has arrived.  You can see in my picture that I've included the replacement and also the first one that was used.  Shaking my head a bit.  As for the new candle, I do, in fact, LOVE the scent.  It's strong enough to fill my smaller office with nice fragrance and it comes in the cutest little tin.  It does burn a bit fast so I don't think it'll last too long but I will completely enjoy it as long as it lasts.  I'm just not particularly happy that I have to go through the hassle of returning the VERY used product that I originally received within the next couple of weeks or I'll be charged for both.  If not for this issue, I would have easily given 4+ stars.

title: First one was totally used!  The second one is better!

body: You can view this review on youtube just bring up sharee1982 I am an avid lover of candles and I treat and care for them very well. I keep my wick's trimmed properly and I burn them correctly making sure to liquefy the entire top layer of wax so I do not get memory rings. The first burn is the most important. There are several factors to think about when deciding if a candle will be great fit for you. The scent is the most important factor for me, and the linger factor is very important too. Secondly,  a candle needs to burn evenly.  Another very important factor is how long it last, I want something that is worth the price tag. I also want a candle that doesn't have that waxy smell or smoky smell. I like a lead-free wick whenever possible. I take all these factors into consideration when I rate a candle. Scent- I find that scent is truly a matter of personal preference and therefore this is the one area that is kind of a matter of personal taste. Some people like fruity scents or floral smells. Some enjoy tropical or food or fruit related scents and so on and so on. Some people love a strong scented candle, others like something delicate. Where some candles really beat out others is the linger factor, it does not matter if the candle is delicate or strong it should linger, a good candles scent will still linger hours after you light it. I feel like some people will rate a candle poorly based on a non understanding of scent styles and expectations. You cannot expect a delicate scented candle to fill and entire living room, something like that may be good for a relaxing bath or just to scent the bathroom. If you want a candle that can scent a large room, go for a scent style that is strong. With all these things touched upon here is my review of the Aspen Bay Jar Volcano candle. This volcano candles scent is delicate yet sensual and it feels invigorating and is unique. I use this as a good bath candle, it creates a spa like feel when I bathe. If you want something to fill a large living room this is not that candle unless you burn two at once and place them on different ends of the room. People who smelled this in a store say it's strong, but that is because they burn several of them at once in stores so they really hit you. I find that this candle has a delicate citrus scent and I enjoy it most in a small intimate space. The actual burn- This candle does not burn evenly at all. It does not matter how well you care for it and trust me I know how to care for candles. It's not the worst, but it does have a layer that just will not burn. The good thing is, it does not have a smoky or waxy smell and that's a plus and it does have a long shelf time because it is a large candle and it is a quality candle. My overall wrap up- I gave this 3 stars because it does last and it is attractive, it does not have a waxy smell and although I prefer a much stronger scent it's nice for a bath and the citrus scent is unique. I didn't give 5 stars because it does not burn evenly and that's a bummer. I hope this review helps. If you have questions I am happy to answer them. You can view my review of this candle on you tube sharee1982

body: I have been considering this candle for a while now, and when I found out they had a mini size I thought it was the perfect time to try it out at a lower cost. I had high hopes, and unfortunately maybe they were a little TOO high. The scent itself is OK, but I don't think it's anything unique or something to obsess over. It does smell stronger than a diffuser, plugin, or some other types of products, but it's no more strong than most other candles on the market (lit or unlit). My biggest gripe is that the wick is too short. The wick ended with about 1/3 of the candle still left in the container. I've only seen such short wicks in really cheap candles (I actually just had the same issue with a $5 3-wick candle from Walmart, which ended with about 1/3 of the candle left, too), so it was disappointing that this expensive candle (even if it was mini size) has that issue. I thought the container was cute enough, so I poured boiling water into it and then dumped the rest of the wax (once it was liquid). There was a TON of wax left in there (probably enough to make about two tealight candles). This is probably an OK luxury gift candle to give to someone as a housewarming gift or something, but there are definitely cheaper (and better) options out there. I won't be purchasing the full size due to the risk of the short wick issue, and having so much wasted wax.

title: Glad I Purchased The Mini Size And Not Full Size

body: As an aficionado of scented candles, I recently had the pleasure of experiencing the Chesapeake Bay Candle PT31905 Scented Candle, and I must say, it left an indelible impression. Here's my comprehensive review: Scent: The aroma of this candle is nothing short of enchanting. Its fragrance, described as a blend of calming lavender and refreshing sea salt, transports you to a serene seaside retreat. The lavender notes are soothing and therapeutic, while the subtle hint of sea salt adds a refreshing twist. The balance between the two is impeccable, creating an ambiance that is both relaxing and invigorating. Burn Time: One of the standout features of this candle is its impressive burn time. It burns evenly, without tunneling, and lasts for hours on end. Whether I'm unwinding after a long day or setting the mood for a cozy evening in, I can rely on this candle to provide long-lasting enjoyment. Packaging: The packaging of the Chesapeake Bay Candle PT31905 is simple yet elegant. The glass jar exudes a sense of sophistication, while the minimalist label complements the overall aesthetic. It's the kind of candle you'd proudly display in any room of your home or office. Wax Quality: I appreciate that this candle is crafted from high-quality, eco-friendly soy wax. Not only does soy wax burn cleaner and longer than traditional paraffin wax, but it's also a sustainable choice. Knowing that I'm supporting environmentally conscious practices only enhances my enjoyment of this candle. Price: While the Chesapeake Bay Candle PT31905 is priced slightly higher than some alternatives, its exceptional quality justifies the cost. In my opinion, the superior fragrance, burn time, and eco-friendly ingredients make it a worthwhile investment.

body: I was really excited for this candle. I've been experimenting with candles lately and wanted this to be the candle I burn while working from home. It arrived last night and as soon as I opened it this morning and gave it a whiff, my first thought was, This smells like bug spray! I briefly thought about returning it, but I was so looking forward to a candle touted as awaken + invigorate that I still wanted to at least give it a chance. So I went ahead and lit it and have had it going for awhile... still not great! The candle looks really nice and the smell isn't super offensive (kinda subtle actually), but it's just not pleasant for anyone who knows what roach spray smells like... I guess we can blame Raid for that. And like another reviewer said (wish I read that before I bought this), I smell no eucalyptus at all. It's so disappointing, but I guess that's the risk you take buying candles online rather than getting them in person so you can smell them first. I'm still going to give it a chance for the day and see if it grows on me or something, but I have low expectations at this point. And I surely won't be lighting it if I know anyone's coming over anytime soon for fear that they think I have roach problem.

body: Rose Water Candle has captured my heart and transformed my space into a fragrant paradise. This exquisite gem fills the air with an alluring floral melody! This candle's scent is absolutely enchanting; the delicate aroma of rose water soothes while stimulating, creating an intoxicating ambiance and instantly lifting my mood. Walking through its aromatic rose garden-esque surroundings is like strolling through a blossoming garden filled with the sweet fragrance of freshly picked blooms! This candle's quality is truly outstanding. The wax burns evenly and cleanly, providing long-term fragrance. Furthermore, its elegant wick has been meticulously designed to produce a steady flame that dances gracefully - an experience to remember. Rose Water Candles not only delight the senses, but they add an exquisite touch to any space. Their minimalist yet chic design make them an excellent complement to any decor style; whether placed in your living room, bedroom, or bathroom it creates an indescribably relaxing environment that enhances any atmosphere. Are you in search of the perfect candle to capture the beauty and elegance of blossoming roses, as well as add an air of sophistication? Look no further than Rose Water Candle - its captivating fragrance and high quality make it a must-have among candle enthusiasts. Give one as a gift, and experience its floral symphony!

body: Really like the smell on this - it's clean and fresh - smells a bit like men's cologne or aftershave. But it tunnels SO BADLY no matter how long or short the wick is. I had to scoop out like 20% of the candle to get it to even keep burning, and put foil over it, leaning in to heat the wax evenly enough to melt to one level. I lit it again - and it just started tunneling again immediately - so I can only burn it with aluminum foil wrapped around it and leaning over the top.. not exactly the best decor look. Thankfully, I have multiple wax melters, so the extra wax didn't go to waste - but I would never buy this brand again...

body: I was so looking forward to this candle because it has such great reviews I‚Äôm just looking for something that I didn‚Äôt have to keep let and let the sense Rome unfortunately this was not that candle. After lighting  it once it burned out in five minutes, I lit it again hoping it was just a snag and another five minutes of burned out I tried again and the third time it last about 10 minutes. It kept making a deeper and deeper hole for itself for the wax filled up and now I can‚Äôt even light it anymore because the wick is completely under wax. I had this candle less than an hour. As for the scent I barely smell anything. I will be exchanging  this immediately. I believe a lot of these reviews are fake, but I will give the manufacture a benefit of the doubt and say this was it a flop candle and I‚Äôll let them send me one more and I‚Äôll keep you posted with my honest review. OK here‚Äôs my second Riverview it‚Äôs been two days I got the new candle and it burns beautifully there‚Äôs no hole it doesn‚Äôt burn out every five minutes in fact I lit it once and it stayed lit and the smell is perfect so beware if you get a busted candle it could happen just return it for a brand new one you won‚Äôt be disappointed the second time hopefully because I‚Äôm very happy with this product now .

body: I am a migraine Queen.  Certain scents cause instant migraines due to whatever is used to scent the candle.  This one does not contain problem oils. (I haven't nailed down said problems, and I never know from just smelling the unlit candle.  It is after the candle is lit that the migraine kicks in.) No migraine from this one. The scent is delicate but long lasting.  It scents the room nicely and the scent lingers even after the candle is extinguished.  The candle is a good one that doesn't melt away to nothing in an hour, leaving the buyer wondering why they paid so much for a cheap thrill. I gifted one to a co-worker who gives it high marks, good praise indeed.  This person is hard to please and sets a very high bar.  If she had not been as pleased with the candle, she would have told me not to waste my money on them again.

body: I chose this company because it's name: CHESAPEAKE BAY CANDLES. The name brought back some good childhood memories of growing up as a U.S. Army Brat in Maryland and around the Chesapeake Bay. Patronizing the shops and homemade goods. Simpler, somewhat soothing, relaxing times. Anyways, this candle has a slow burn & a light to medium 'throw'.  But I must admit, I didn't get a hint of jasmine or cashmere. Unless cashmere and jasmine are supposed to smell like lightly scented hand soap, bleach and fresh fern & a hint of honeysuckle/ moss covered waterfalls in a national park. Which it isn't supposed to. And mind you I was burning this in my living room. Not the bathroom & no bleach anywhere. In fact I'm fresh out. Go figure. It's all in the NOSE OF THE BEHOLDER. lol Who knows? You might actually smell the jasmine or cashmere... or something else completely different. Hopefully pleasing to your olfactory senses. But it's a win all the same and functions perfectly in the loo. The fragrance is perfect without being too heady. No heinous powdery or perfumed or even 'fabric softener type' scents that are popular; the latter I sometimes grab like every other person out there.  Also, no high flame or flare up. Nevertheless, you should still keep a close eye on any candle. Because it has such a light but clean & fresh smell, this candle functions best in a small space: restroom, den, an office space, a guest room. You get the idea. It is a tranquil aroma that's a gentler way to start your day with your morning shower.  I look forward to testing out CHESAPEAKE BAY CANDLE'S other goods.
date: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2018

body: The vanilla bean is a subtle, lovely, authentic scent. I don't know how long it will last since I've had it such a short time, but I let it burn the first time for about 30 minutes, and it was down about 1/4 inch. This is my second Lulu candle. My first was an ocean-breeze scent, also very nice, and it was the smaller size. It came with a very nice lid, but this larger one came without a lid. The labels can be removed easily to give a clean look. This jar is black glass, while the first smaller one was clear. The clear looks messier once the candle starts to melt down. The candle comes in a very sturdy square box that tells what's inside, but it would still be beautiful wrapped as a gift.

body: I went to a trendy new restaurant and one of these candles were burning in the bathroom. I loved the smell so I looked them up and purchased their best seller. I'm pretty sure that wasn't the scent the restaurant was using but I LOVED it. It's a white floral with the weight of oud and a touch of high-class powder.  I can see how others think its a bit dated but I think it smells wonderful. SO strong and lasts and lasts.  I've burned through most of the jasmine oud one and then decided to try a different smell for the second candle. My best friend had some sandalwood rose lotion when we were younger and I was expecting something similar. It's vaguely like that lotion, but this is a more realistic rose. My boyfriend wasn't a fan because he doesn't like roses. The jasmine one was stronger but this one is a nice change of pace. The sandalwood is there and gives it a modern spin. I'll burn it when he's not at my apt. I also love that these are soy wax candles with a cotton wick. I don't feel like I'm inhaling petro products.
date: Reviewed in the United States on May 7, 2024
title: Love these candles!

body: I bought this candle looking for a Le Labo Santal 26 dupe. Upon arrival, it was packaged really well and had the aesthetic of Le Labo products. The candle is a really good option as a gift since it basically only needs to be wrapped to be a giftable item. The candle itself however smells nothing like Santal, I own Santal 33 and know Santal 26 very well, and this candle has basically no resemblance to either. Now don't get me wrong, this candle smells pretty good and is very strong, which is great for me because my roommate has a very heavy ethnic smell and this covers it up very well for when guests come over. The smell of the candle does have some sandalwood scent and it is pleasing, but just isn't Santal 26 or 33. If you want the Santal 26 candle smell, I recommend you just buy the candle or its room spray equivalent which is $100 on the website for 100mL.
date: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
title: Smells good, but definitely not like Santal 26

body: I was excited to try the Lulu Jasmine, Oud & Sandalwood candle as so many reviews were positive. The black glass has an elegant, lovely presentation. I am replacing my current candles with non-toxic, clean burning soy wax so I really wanted to like this candle. But WOW...scent is WAY too strong! It's overpowering and headache-inducing. Maybe it's the particular scent I selected, but definitely a disappointment. Unfortunately after three attempts, I will be discarding this candle. I prefer a subtle, less-is-more fragrance. UPDATE 2/9/2024: I was advised by Lulu Candle Company there are scents with a softer scent throw. I took a chance and ordered the Tobacco Spice and Vanilla- and I'm enjoying it. body: I‚Äôve been slowly trying to replace all of my big brand toxic candles around the house with better options. Did you know that candles that contain artificial colors, synthetic wicks and paraffin wax or blended wax are actually carcinogenic? Not for me. Lulu candles checks all the boxes for a clean candle so I don‚Äôt have to give up the cozy warmth when I have company or just simply want some relaxing ambiance all to myself. My personal favorites so far are Tobacco Spice and Vanilla - which has a smoky richness cut with sweet notes and Sandalwood Rose - the woodsy depth of Sandalwood with just enough floral not to be over powering or too powdery. I can‚Äôt wait to try out a few more, all of the sizes are simple and aesthetically pleasing with a neutral boutique apothecary vibe. And yes they are abit pricey compared to other 100% soy candles available but the scent selection is much wider with Lulu Candles. I personally have not had any problems with weakness of scent or wax tunneling as other consumers mentioned. My only critique would be that I wish the 9oz came with a lid - but I‚Äôve just been putting them back in the paper box they are shipped in when I switch them out.
date: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024

body: The media could not be loaded. I originally bought these candles because my husband loves to cook and his cooking stinks up our house. He's such a love bug, but that doesn't mean our home has to smell like garlic and feet. Bless his heart. All of the candles I've purchased from other brands last a few days and emit a faint aroma of scent, barely noticeable. So, I tried this one. Not expecting much, I was really surprised that within an hour, my whole house (1700 Sq ft) smelled so nice, but not overpowered by fragrance. I was all, Nice.  A few hours later, at bedtime, I went to blow out the candle and noticed the wax had barely melt down, like barely at all. Normally, after several hours of burning scented candles, there would be a pool of melted wax floating in the candle. Not this candle. The wax lasts so long, there was hardly a divet in the candle, like it had just been lit. This candle is worth every single penny. You'll wind up actually saving money, not needing to buy many candles, just to make your home smell nice. New, longtime customer here!

body: I have spent years fighting to find a decent pair of bluetooth headphones since no phone manufacturer wants to make a decent phone with a jack anymore (which is endlessly stupid, but I digress). I have tried everything form fancy expensive Galaxy Buds to a myriad of budget options, and all have the same problems. Flawed connectivity, noticeably glitchy, slightly reduced sound quality. These finally fix it. The inclusion of an option to use a headphone jack on devices that let you is a great feature. Along with multipoint connect. They fit perfectly around my skinny neck (your mileage may very on that), so travel with them is a breeze. And for the sound quality, these are absolutely the best headphones for your money. I was loathe to go to overears full time because I like being able to take one out to hear my surroundings, and every noise passthrough I used before was sucky. (usually the outside noise obnoxiously trebley). Not with these. I actually go to concerts to listen with my headphones on because it actually makes the concerts sound better than with no headphones. Extremely convincing, near perfect noise passthrough. The app is easy to use and has a great selection of features: from custom EQs, to adjusting the noise pass through, to other various quality of life settings. The 3D adaptive sound feature is great, though a little tricky to set up at first, and noise cancellation is very good, though not the best in the world. The battery life is also almost unbelievable. I use these headphones a lot--sometimes all day--and I still only have to charge them once or twice a week. Multipoint connection is also a very nice plus if, say, I am working at my computer and still want to be able to answer phone calls hands-free. There are some minor flaws with them, though. First sometimes very low bassey notes from the outside world can trigger the speakers in them and give you very loud, deep popping noises. (E.g., this occasionally happens when I am riding in the car and hitting bumps in the road). Occasional outside sounds in passthrough through will sound muddled. Also the noise cancellation--while quite good--isn't perfect for every situation. Specifically, it has more trouble than, say, Bose headphones with loud, sudden sounds like fireworks. But for the money, it is still the best noise cancellation and passthrough system you can buy. Another (minor) complaint, though, is that the adaptive settings aren't always very great. It often thinks I am sitting and automatically turns on noise cancellation when I am very much driving or walking around town or once even ice skating--all situations where passthrough is crucial. And even if I am sitting, sometimes I really want passthrough on (like if I'm in a cafe), but it automatically tries to turn noise cancelling on annoyingly. Thankfully, it can be easily overridden in the app. These days, I usually just keep the adaptive sound setting off and adjust the settings to fit the situation but sometimes it will randomly go back to automatic/adaptive mode. My final and complaint is with the microphone for phone calls. Sometimes it works perfectly and the other line can hear my fine, sometimes all they can hear is background noise, sometimes they really can't hear me at all. I am not sure if it is some sort of firmware issue or if the microphone placement is just too far from my mouth, but for phone calls it can be a tad unreliable. When it works, which is around 75% of the time, it's perfectly good even though I have to talk a little louder than I normally would sometimes. But all those flaws aside, these are probably the best all-around headphones I have owned and for the $120 I paid for them it's a steal. They may be more expensive as I got them on sale, but I have used headphones multiple times the price that are poorer quality and less functional than these. I'd have paid upwards of twice the price for what I got.
date: Reviewed in the United States on May 22, 2023
title: Best Headphones I Ever Owned, Especially for the Money

body: First and foremost, I have had these headphones for a few months and now feel comfortable giving a solid review. I truly love these headphones. I am not exaggerating when i say i use these daily. The sound quality is great (it‚Äôs obviously not the best ever but for $99 it‚Äôs a 10/10 for me). They completely cover your ears, and there is very minimal noise leak when they are on your head which i was very concerned about. They are also super lightweight and don‚Äôt hurt your head. They are easy to use and pair. Also another GREAT thing is the latency is great too. I‚Äôm an avid YouTube watcher and if the sound wasn‚Äôt matching with the voices these would have gone RIGHT BACK however, the latency is basically non existent. The final thing that is GREAT..AMAZING about these is the charge. It will hold a charge for DAYS. I kid you not, they have never once died on me. I work from home so i will have them on and in use all day long and i swear on my life they will only be 70% by the end of the day!! These are truly a solid pair of headphones and worth every penny! They also come with a cord so you can have them corded as well. Also as far as people have told me, the microphone pics up your voice just fine. The noise cancellation option is great too. I liken them to Beats in that regard. They also get hella loud! My only issues would be that they do FEEL kinda cheap but the performance outshines that. Also they do not listen for Siri commands and as far as i know you can‚Äôt change the song or go back on a song with the headphones. Not a huge deal, however something that i took note of. Get these if you are looking for a relatively inexpensive pair of over-ear headphones that are good quality.
date: Reviewed in the United States on April 22, 2024
title: Must get!! Great deal and solid quality for Price

body: I absolutely love these headphones, the sound and bass is so good. The battery life is soooo good, it lasts so long. title: SO GOOD

body: These headphones are light, airy and they feel like holding a feather; however they‚Äôre not as easy to fly off in the wind. Their performance is amazing, I wish I didn‚Äôt have to download an app to really get full quality but that‚Äôs one downside. The sound quality if gravitating with the surround sound and the noise cancelation mode is great for going in crowded places, as someone who gets overwhelmed. I mowed the yard and with the NC my ears were much at ease from the loud noise. I love the build of the headphones, sleek but also angular and round at the right places. As a girl who loves to personalize things I wish there was more space on the surface of the cuffs to ass stickers but that‚Äôs just a small unneeded want. The ear cuts for ears perfectly, and they do not push down on your ears, or head; making wearing them for hours not leave slight pain like most headphones do. I love that pressing the power button once tells the user the battery power and pressing it for two seconds turns it off, it‚Äôs easy to use and does not require mass amounts of brain cells waiting to be lost. I have yet to test the durability as I just got them a day ago. On the other hand, the charging is impeccable. I received them at 60% charge and have been using them for quite some time and they are still, at 56%. Along with the NC mode the headphones also come with an ambient mode for everyday use, for people who want to hear their surroundings as a safety mechanism which is great versatility. One con I noticed soon inspection is that  they don‚Äôt fold down like most headphones. Now I know they weren‚Äôt advertised like that but I still wish that was a quality. I bet there are much better quality and overall everything headphones out there but for a discounted prime day price 88$ which is cheap for headphones, (but not for my wallet) these are a steal and I give these an 8.5/10!

As appearance, the 720n‚Äôs have a 3.5 port for Xbox, PlayStation, PC, etc though the 3.5 port only works when the headphones are powered off. I love that with the Headphones Connect app, you can customize almost everything with the headphones (you can even connect 2 devices simultaneously). The 720n headphones have Alexa built in, which doesn‚Äôt work the BEST. When it works, it‚Äôs good. The headphones ear part moves flat.
