body: If you are living in a roommate situation like I am, cleaning supplies are one of the largest household expenses. And I personally like Meyer's because I believe (i hope) its a little better than other cleaners in terms of toxicity or cleaning ability. I was buying pre-diluted bottles at Walmart and would go through them in a couple weeks. I only paid ~14 dollars for this two pack, and I can honestly tell you that even with all the cleaning I do, this concentrate will last me the rest of the year here. You need only a tiny bit of concentrate in the bottle, it goes a long way! And the smell isn't overpowering. I spent 10x last year on cleaning spray rather than buying these concentrated bottles. 10/10 recommend!

body: I never enjoyed cleaning until I started using Mrs Meyers. I actually love cleaning, doing dishes, smelling those amazing scents. Not for everyone, I know, so if you‚Äôre sensitive to smell you should probably go the unscented route. They don‚Äôt make my head hurt like other cleaners have. I am a former bleach addict, I couldn‚Äôt clean anything without it! Now I used this concentrate in my spray bottle and if I need some deeper cleaning I add some white vinegar. It makes everything smell amazing! I also use it in my mop bucket with vinegar. It leaves your floors nice and clean with no sticky residue. We have tile and wood and I usually just damp mop my wood with this solution. I also mix the scents. I just ran out of lavender which is one of my favorites. The basil is a little strong for my taste but mixed with something else is more tolerable. They last forever! I use with a magic eraser on counters and sinks, toilets, mirrors and everything. Wipe with a microfiber and no spots or residue. Smells great and so do you. Also doesn‚Äôt leave your hands all cracked and dry.

body: I love Mrs. Meyers products.  They clean very well,  and a little goes a long way. I use them for my home and cleaning jobs. I've read some people complain about a strong scent. The scent can be strong,  but again you dont need a lot. Id rather have a strong essential oils smell, than chemicals.  Occasionally,  for a client,  I've had to use chemical cleaners and the burning, coughing,  and unpleasant smell are not worth it to me. Also, some have said that they don't clean well. I guess that would depend on how dirty something is to start with.  The less frequently you clean, the greasier/crustier the object is that you are cleaning the harder it is too clean with any product.  My experience with Mrs. Meyers cleaning quality is excellent.  I use them for dishes, floors,  laundry,  appliances,  vehicles,  anything and everything.

body: Now, I'll admit, I was skeptical at first. I mean, Mr. Clean sounds like the name of a retired pro-wrestler turned cleaning guru, right? But let me tell you, this cleaner is the real deal. It's like hiring a tiny army of cleanliness ninjas to tackle the grime in your home. And don't even get me started on the scent. It's so fresh, it's like your house just took a shower. I catch myself sniffing around like a bloodhound just to get another whiff. Who needs air fresheners when you've got Mr. Clean? But here's the kicker ‚Äì it's so concentrated, you could probably clean the entire neighborhood with just one bottle. Okay, maybe not the whole neighborhood, but you get the idea. A little goes a long way, which means more bang for your buck and more time for you to do... well, anything else!

body: when I think of mangoes, I think of tropical paradise, fruity cocktails, and maybe even a little Hawaiian shirt action. So, naturally, I had to give this cleaner a try. First off, the scent? It's like sticking your nose in a mango while riding a unicorn through a rainbow. I swear, every time I use it, I half expect to hear steel drums playing in the background. Who knew cleaning could be this exotic? But let's get down to business. This cleaner means business. Stubborn stains? Not anymore, my friend. Lysol Mango scent is here to save the day! And here's the best part ‚Äì it's so versatile, you could probably use it to clean your car, your pet elephant, heck, maybe even your neighbor's lawn gnome collection (if they don't mind, of course). Talk about a multitasking marvel!

body: This product was recommended by my stone installer. I just remodeled my kitchen, and I asked the fabricator what he recommended for the countertops. He said Pink STuff is what he recommends to all his clients. It's organic, effective and easy to use. I purchased it and I agree, it's great. It wipes up all stains and drips from my countertop, and doesn't leave any greasy residue. Of course, my stone is still brand new,but this is what it looks like after using Pink Stuff. You can see the reflection of the chandelier in it, it's so shiny! And I like that it is a multi-purpose cleaner, it will work on almost everything in the kitchen and bath. A great buy!
date: Reviewed in the United States on August 5, 2024
title: Great for granite...and everything else

body: As a homeowner, I'm always on the lookout for effective and efficient cleaning products, especially when it comes to tackling tough stains and grime. The Pink Stuff - The Miracle All Purpose Cleaning Paste has truly lived up to its name and exceeded my expectations. It has worked wonders in completely cleaning my bathroom tiles and grouts, transforming them from dull and stained to sparkling and pristine. In this review, I'll share my experience with The Pink Stuff and why it has become an indispensable part of my cleaning routine. Powerful Cleaning Action: The Pink Stuff's cleaning paste boasts an incredible cleaning action that easily removes stubborn stains and grime from bathroom tiles and grouts. I was astonished at how effortlessly it tackled soap scum, water stains, and dirt build-up that had accumulated over time. With just a small amount of the paste and a bit of scrubbing, my tiles and grouts were restored to their original shine and cleanliness. Effective on Different Surfaces: What impressed me the most about The Pink Stuff is its versatility. It is not only perfect for bathroom tiles and grouts but also works wonders on other surfaces throughout the house. I've used it on sinks, countertops, stovetops, and even outdoor furniture with equally remarkable results. The fact that one product can tackle various cleaning tasks is a huge plus for me. Gentle on Surfaces: Despite its powerful cleaning action, The Pink Stuff is surprisingly gentle on surfaces. I had concerns about using an abrasive cleaner on my tiles and grouts, but this cleaning paste did not cause any damage or scratches. It effectively cleaned without compromising the integrity of the surfaces, which is a critical aspect for me when choosing a cleaning product. Easy Application and Quick Results: Using The Pink Stuff is a breeze. I simply apply a small amount of the paste onto a damp cloth or sponge and gently scrub the tiles and grouts. The paste adheres well to the surface, ensuring maximum cleaning power. What's even more impressive is how quickly I saw results. In just a few minutes of cleaning, the difference was evident, and my bathroom looked noticeably cleaner. Pleasant Scent: I appreciate that The Pink Stuff has a mild and pleasant scent. It's not overpowering like some other cleaning products, which can be bothersome during cleaning sessions. The subtle scent leaves the bathroom smelling fresh and clean without being too overwhelming. Affordable and Long-Lasting: A little goes a long way with The Pink Stuff. The small tub of cleaning paste lasts a surprisingly long time, making it an affordable and cost-effective option. It's great to know that I don't have to constantly restock, as a small amount of the paste is enough for thorough cleaning. Conclusion: In conclusion, The Pink Stuff - The Miracle All Purpose Cleaning Paste has become my go-to cleaning product for effectively and completely cleaning my bathroom tiles and grouts. Its powerful cleaning action, gentle yet versatile nature, and pleasant scent have made it a joy to use. The fact that it's affordable and long-lasting is an added bonus. I highly recommend The Pink Stuff to anyone seeking a reliable and efficient cleaning solution that truly lives up to its promise of being a miracle cleaning paste. It has made a significant difference in the cleanliness and appearance of my bathroom, and I'm confident it will do the same for others looking for top-notch cleaning results.

title: Excellent!!!

body: Sorry that I didn't take pictures.  I was in a huge hurry to get started cleaning when my Pink Stuff products arrived.  Once I started cleaning, I was literally having such a good time that I couldn't stop.  The lid on my coffee cup exploded from the pressure and my forgetting to open the vent.  Coffee splattered in places I didn't think it could get, including all over me burning me horribly.  I had to make a mad dash to urgent care for treatment so the coffee had time to soak into the stucco and dry.  I knew I was facing an impossible mission cleaning the walls by the time I got home.  I was so badly burned on my chest and neck that I really couldn't clean the mess even when I wanted to.  FINALLY, two weeks later, it was time to get it clean.  I dampened the stucco, stepped away from the wall, sprayed twice, and wiped. I had to wait afew minutes and repeat. VIOLA! Squeaky clean.  No hard scrubbing, sweating, or pain!  Do yourself a favor and get this stuff.  If it can remove coffee stains from stucco, I can't wait to fully recover from my burns to try it on more impossible stains.
